title: Controversy over the moon
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Charles L. Finance
brief_description: Presents the controversy concerning the geological make-up of the moon - specifically the origin of large lunar craters. Two eminent scientists interpret the same available data and discuss reasons for their divergent views. Suitable for upper secondary level.
